text-snippet.content: BRAINLY MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT THE BRAINLY SERVICES AND/OR ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, FUNCTIONALITY, INFORMATION, CONTENT OR OTHER MATERIALS AVAILABLE ON, THROUGH OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE BRAINLY SERVICES OR YOUR BRAINLY SUBSCRIPTION, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE MOBILE SOFTWARE, WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, OR THAT THE BRAINLY SERVICES OR BRAINLY SUBSCRIPTIONS WILL OPERATE UNINTERRUPTED OR IN A TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE MANNER
